title: propertyEditors
description: An array of Umbraco Property Editors

name.description: The friendly name of the property editor, shown in the Umbraco backoffice

alias.description: This must be a unique alias to your property editor

editor.description: This describes details about the editor

view.description: This is the full path to the HTML view for your property editor

valueType.description: This is the type of data you want your property editor to save to Umbraco

hideLabel: If set to true this hides the label for the property editor when used in Umbraco on a document type

isReadOnly: If set to true this makes the property editor read only

prevalues: This is an object that stores an array of prevalue fields or options to configure yout property editor

fields: This is the collection of prevalue fields

key: A unique key for the prevalue field

label: string
The user friendly label for the prevalue

description: A more detailed description for the user

view: The type of editor to use for this prevalue field

javascript.type: A list of Javascript files with full path to load for your property editor

css.type: A list of CSS files with full path to load for your property editor
